body_html: You might try writing a custom gradient that does equivalent logic to compute the gradient without relying on automatic differentiation. I'd guess the discontinuities in representation are causing problems.
body_text: You might try writing a custom gradient that does equivalent logic to compute the gradient without relying on automatic differentiation. I'd guess the discontinuities in representation are causing problems.
body: You might try writing a custom gradient that does equivalent logic to compute the gradient without relying on automatic differentiation. I'd guess the discontinuities in representation are causing problems.
